description.value: An extension of the description of the fluid and dose administered through the feeding tube.

definition.value: The description of the fluid administered through the feeding tube and the dose administered, as given in the medication prescription. Though most cases involve food being administered through the feeding tube, medication is often administered through these tubes as well.
